theme_description: Composite vulnerability index on a 0–1 scale representing overall social vulnerability.
metric_description: Numeric value between 0 and 1; higher values indicate greater vulnerability.

theme_description: Income, employment, poverty, and education levels.
metric_description: CDC RPL Theme 1 score; higher indicates greater socioeconomic vulnerability.
bucket_definition: Same bucket thresholds as overall SVI.

metric_description: CDC RPL Theme 2 score; higher indicates more vulnerability.
bucket_definition: Same bucket thresholds as overall SVI.

metric_description: CDC RPL Theme 3 score; higher indicates greater linguistic/cultural vulnerability.
bucket_definition: Same bucket thresholds as overall SVI.

theme_description: Housing density, mobile homes, group quarters, vehicle access.
metric_description: CDC RPL Theme 4 score; higher indicates vulnerability in housing/transit.
bucket_definition: Same bucket thresholds as overall SVI.

theme_description: Categorical vulnerability grouping based on overall SVI score.
Unique census tract GEOID used for SVI scoring.
metric_description: 11-digit FIPS code for the census tract.
